meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> grown in a <radical>warehouse</radical> will be very <kanji>pale</kanji>. They never see the sun, so they don't grow to have bright colors.
readingMnemonic: When you grow <kanji>pale</kanji> flowers like this, they don't grow a <reading>soul</reading> (そう). Soul adds color to plants and flowers. That's probably why ghosts and dead bodies are pale too.
